entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • COM Hosting not supported for C++/CLR projects (.NET Core+) #108804
  • Timeout on deleting builds for Wasm.Build.Tests.TestAppScenarios.SatelliteLoadingTests.LoadSatelliteAssembly #108801
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException in NtProcessInfoHelper.GetProcessInfos when retrieving Process.SessionId #108798
  • Block layout of partition loop not ideal #108794
  • Connection strings stored in K8s CSI Volumes are not resolved during function discovery #108793
  • JIT doesn't do CSE for comparison on string.Length #108791
    Future
  • Regression in .NET 9-RC2: Case-insensitive handling of JsonNode #108790
    9.0.0
  • [System.Text.Json] Consider removing `RequiresUnreferenceCode`/`RequiresDynamicCode` annotations from certain `JsonSerializer` APIs #108781
    10.0.0

Closed

  • osx/arm64: Assertion failed 'm_store->TypeGet() == m_src->TypeGet()' during 'Assertion prop' #108612
    9.0.0
  • Should stack traces collected in filters have managed EH frames in them? #107995
    9.0.0
  • win/x64: Assertion failed 'false && "found use of a node that is not in the LIR sequence"' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #108613
    9.0.0
  • GC picks wrong L3 cache size on Linux #76290
    10.0.0
  • OpenAPI hangs on XElement #108755
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Custom schema generation in STJ #108778
  • [WASI] When upgrading to vnext version of the WASI_SDK with clang19 there are build errors #108686
  • Runtime fails to marshal arguments, throws ArgumentException in corner case COM interop scenario #11498
  • EventSource.Write corrupts nullable values in Release builds using .NET Native (UWP) #13065
  • How to run unit tests with corerun? #108768
  • 我应该如何正确的使用 IIncrementalGenerator #108744

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix CET debugger stepping over CALL instructions #108809
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Unroll SpanHelpers.SequenceEqual in a late phase #108808
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: reset reverse opts when updating HW intrinsic #108807
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump versions of maintenance-packages dependencies consumed in runtime #108806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0] Arm64: Use TYP_SIMD8 for AddAcross #108805
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix optimization of Vector512 And + Not to AndNot #108803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update source-build team references #108802
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0] Update the JSON schema exporter to reuse schemas more aggressively. #108800
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [JIT] [APX] Enable additional General Purpose Registers. #108799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Reduce net core app current package dependencies, increase direct update availability #108797
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • [JIT] Add legacy extended EVEX encoding and EVEX.ND feature to x64 emitter backend #108796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Updated runtime test building doc #108792
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Mitigate first-class Span breaks #108789
    area-codeflow
  • Remove RUC & RDC annotations from certain JsonSerializer methods. #108782
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Rename `WasmBuildTests` settings to the names of properties they impact #108780
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [cdac] Make cDAC delegate to the DAC instead of the other way around #108772
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: very simple cloning heuristic #108771
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] WebSocket stress #108770
    area-System.Net

Merged

  • Make RC2 light up for OpenSSLs built with -no-rc2 #108795
    area-System.Security
  • [release/9.0] Remove string.Trim{,Start,End}(ReadOnlySpan<char>) ref-API #108777
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime, breaking-change
  • Add project to create helix work items for host tests #108529
    area-Host
  • Arm64: Use TYP_SIMD8 for AddAcross #108727
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove managed EH code frames from stack trace #108723
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix optimization of Vector512 And + Not to AndNot #108775
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] bgc deadlock fix #108774
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix an issue with the last level cache values on Linux running on certain AMD Processors #108492
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [wasm] Include browser targets if RID is not wasi-wasm #108434
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [browser] Make boot json file name configurable #108708
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Remove string.Trim{,Start,End}(ReadOnlySpan<char>) #108537
    area-System.Runtime, blocking-release, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • Update the JSON schema exporter to reuse schemas more aggressively. #108764
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Add test case for deserializing JsonObject as JsonExtensionData #108673
    area-System.Text.Json, 10.0.0
  • Delete UsePublishedCrossgen2 property #108693
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: Use binary search in `FlowGraphNaturalLoops::GetLoopByHeader` #108739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fold `(x + c1) + c2` in lowering #108779
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the instruction check in 'CodeGen::genInstrWithConstant()' when called by 'CodeGen::genHomeStackSegment()'. #108776
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Remove BrotliUtils.MaxInputSize #108769
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [WASI] Updates to work with up coming Wasi sdk #108687
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-wasi
  • bgc deadlock fix #108773
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fixes deadlock for IncrementingPollingCounter callbacks #108648
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 8.0.11
  • Disable codeql on official builds part 2 #108767
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: run a late pass of empty try/finally/fault removal #108003
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • System.Net Stress Tests Improvements 2 #108703
    area-System.Net
  • Add managed Mac signing implementation #107378
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Use live apphost when publishing ilc as singlefile #105004
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete DomainAssembly #108618
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Consolidate LocateNativeCompiler target #103375
    NO-MERGE, blocked, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [cdac] ExecutionManager contract and RangeSectionMap lookup unit tests #108685
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Bump Microsoft.Private.Intellisense to 20241010.1 #108765
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocked
  • [release/9.0] Bump Microsoft.Private.Intellisense to 20241010.1 #108766
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocked, 9.0.0
  • Delete STUBLINKER_GENERATES_UNWIND_INFO #108684
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Automatically synthesize ilproj assembly names for tests #108730
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • [CG] Bump Microsoft.IO.Redist to 6.0.1 #106102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Keep delegate object alive during invoke #105099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Stop calling morph from CSE #106695
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Switch `SwiftSelf<T>` position requirement to last #108547
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix `IsOSVersionAtLeast` when build or revision are not provided #108748
    area-System.Runtime, os-maccatalyst, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Stop testing with V8 and `wasmconsole` #108711
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Remove all kernel32.dll references and debug breakpoints #108647
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mark or set encoding param in StreamReader ctor to be nullable #108542
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix SortedSet.InternalIndexOf 102118 #102249
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2557971 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable linux-x64 dev-innerloop #108581
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement ProcessStartInfo.InheritHandles for Windows #107836
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
